channel.title: Help Please
channel.description:
Okay.. my last server i used Hamachi but no one could connect even when i had them on my hamachi network they just couldnt get on so im restarting using No-Ip and I Need help on what server pack i should use and how do i get it up and starting please help!
last server was nice i just wish people could have logged in.[br][size=1]Posted on: July 27, 2007, 11:26:43 AM[/size][hr]Please Guys I Really need help![br][size=1]Posted on: July 27, 2007, 11:38:10 AM[/size][hr]come on guys i really wanna host this my friends wanna play with me.

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Dcen Dcen
item.description:
@Dcen wrote:

I wanna make a server though something i can call home and my own
all i need to know is how i get No-Ip Set up to a server and what server pack i should download and use.[br][size=1]Posted on: July 27, 2007, 12:15:02 PM[/size][hr]Im Going back to hamachi can anyone tell me how i can let friends join server atleast please.

Read full topic

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Then don’t make a server if you aren’t smart, and go play on a server!

my last server i used Hamachi but no one could connect even when i had them on my hamachi network they just couldnt get on so im restarting using No-Ip and I Need help on what server pack i should use and how do i get it up and starting please help!

last server was nice i just wish people could have logged in.[br][size=1]Posted on: July 27, 2007, 11:26:43 AM[/size][hr]Please Guys I Really need help![br][size=1]Posted on: July 27, 2007, 11:38:10 AM[/size][hr]come on guys i really wanna host this my friends wanna play with me.[/quote]

Instead of bumping and spamming, how about you go read around in the tutorial section and look for the no-ip topic.
